name: bobble frost snowflake
notes:
materials:
yarn: any cotton thread, lace or fingering yarn and optioneel glitter thread held together (sizeâ€¯10 thread, lace weight of fingering yarn)
in the pattern:  
1. cotton thread - scheepjes maxi sweet treat, 25 g/140 m and drops glitter silver: 700 meters 10g
hook: 1,75 - 2 mm

2. fingering yarn - scheepjes catona
hook: 2,5 mm

scissors, tapestry needle to weave in ends. you can use any similar yarn and suitable hook.

skill level: intermediate
